title: AFK, LEAVING MATCHMAKING V'S LOL CLIENT CRASHING -  WHEN ITS NOT YOUR FAULT ?!!
body:
Over the course of the last 2 months i have had 2 seperate  issues with the "lol client" not responding  during matchmaking - i does not matter why, my pc? the lol client? software issues - wtf knows really - my complaint is that leaver buster just see it as me leaving during matchmaking, and when i try and log back in etc, because it was matchmaking you cannot join back in.

i copped 5 x 20 min ban the first time -  and now this crap has just happened again and i am sitting here Sunday morning copping another 5 x 20 min ban due to technical LOL client issues that are very random.

LEAGUE TEAM / YOU GUYS NEED TO COME UP WITH A SOLUTION THAT MAKES LEAVER BUSTER TELL THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN A CRASHED LOL CLIENT WITH A DUMPED LOG FILE AND SOMEONE ACTUALLY LEAVING THE PRE MADE OR AFK GAME ETC - IF THE GAME ACTUALLY CRASHES YOU CAN ALWAYS PROVE IT. JUST LIKE I CAN - ITS NOT MY DAM FAULT AND I SHOULDN'T BE PUNISHED FOR IT - I AM SURE THERE ARE MANY OTHER PEOPLE COPPING BANS FOR SAME REASONS.

WHAT A RIDICULOUS SYSTEM....

I HAVE SPENT $100'S OF DOLLARS ON THIS GAME, AND THINKING YOUR PUNISHING ME ME BY MAKING WE WAIT 1 HOUR TO PLAY BECAUSE OF  BUGGY LOLCLIENT CRASHES IS LUDICROUS - 

FIX THE DAME LEAVER BUSTER TO BAN LEAVERS NOT GENUINE SYSTEM  LOL CLIENT ERRORS....THAT FORCE YOU TO LEAVE THE CUE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
